stylesheets.name: base_palettes
reset

view_overrides.name: remove_images
view_overrides.replacement:
<%= render :partial => 'image' %>
<%= render :partial => 'thumbnails', :locals => { :product => @product } %>

view_overrides.name: product_listing_large
view_overrides.replacement:
• <%= link_to product_image(product), product %> <%= link_to(product, :class => 'info') do %>

    <%= product.name %> <%= number_to_currency product.price %>

    <% end %>

stylesheets.name: large_product_listing

view_overrides.name: product_listing_list
view_overrides.replacement: • <%= link_to product.name, product, :class => 'info' %> <%= number_to_currency product.price %>

stylesheets.name: style_listing
